author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: Chrissy Teigen Had the Best Reaction to Her Nipple Being On National TV
text:
Master of clapbacks Chrissy Teigen is the queen of social media for a reason â€” and it should come as no surprise that when her nipple ended up on national TV during the Super Bowl, she knew just how to respond after someone pointed it out.
@chrissyteigen @johnlegend u the press box ain't save you...ðŸ‘€ pic.twitter.com/KJL5oy5Xtz
â€” Chuck Will, J.D. (@chuckupthedusse) February 6, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below As eagle-eyed Twitter use @chuckupthedusse points out, Chrissy chose to wear a gorgeous, sheer black top to the Super Bowl on Sunday with a light blazer over it â€” but at some point during the game, her blazer fell a little bit to the side and she ended up flashing her boob to everyone watching from home.
But while most of us would likely have either been embarrassed AF by the nip slip or simply chosen to ignore it, the supermodel instead chose to share the freeze frame with her fans along with the glorious response, "Boom goes the dynamite."
boom goes the dynamite https://t.co/WAExp536Q7
â€” christine teigen (@chrissyteigen) February 6, 2017 Thank you for being you, Chrissy. You are truly the hero the world needs right now.
